description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission 19/00268/HOU (Erection of a single story rear extension and new garage at rear of the property) to clarify the proposed pitched roof material
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be material and as such, it is recommended that the S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.
Representations:  2 neighbouring properties have been notified about the proposal, no representations  received.
Please submit a fee for your Pre-Application, for Â£250. This can be paid either online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002
